short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds shortcuts to gmail's left navbar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use the left navbar in Gmail for shortcuts to other gmail folders, labels, and settings.

2024/11/09 0.0.3: various xpaths added to check correct element to workaround changes in gmail UI releases. Stronger checks to ensure that element is loaded in dom before updating.
2023/08/19 0.0.2: changed xpath for finding navbar component because that seems to have changed in a recent gmail update.
